article_text:
Democratic lawmakers say don’t dismantle a Ky. success that’s improving lives

Affordable Care Act best chance ever to raise state’s dismal health standings

article_metadata.title: Save Kynect | Lexington Herald-Leader

og.description: A Washington Post article recently told the story of a mother in Eastern Kentucky who showed up at a small clinic without health insurance and frantic over her 4-year-old daughter’s 103-degree fever and mysterious pain.
og.title: Save Kynect
